website_summaries.verdict: The KEEN Versago provides a lightweight and breathable feel to its users. Many admired Keen’s creativity with the tongue’s design. Although a bit different from the usual, it was still able to deliver an improved fit. What left a number of wearers disappointed were the shoddy construction of the shoe and the thin sole that is predisposed to puncturing. Consumers were also upset about the lack of support needed for a hike.
pros: Many wearers admired the innovation brought by KEEN to the Versago
They said that the integrated tongue provided a much better fit
A significant number of users appreciated its right-out-of-the-box comfort
The KEEN Versago offered sufficient breathability, as experienced by a majority of wearers
After walking for miles using the pair, a handful of wearers confirmed that it's a lightweight hiker
cons: A couple of wearers disliked the shoe’s sole which was thin and prone to punctures
A low percentage of disappointed users experienced drawbacks because of the KEEN Versago’s quality
Some of its parts were peeling away
There were also visible glue excesses
The shoe wasn’t suitable for hikes, according to a few users
They mentioned that the support required for a hike was not enough, as opposed to what KEEN claimed

customer_reviews.title: Greatk Hiking Sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I started to hike a lot more this summer and realized I don't have the right hiking shoes. My books were too heavy for the 2-4 mile hikes I wanted to go on. After some research I came across these little babies.... lightweight and extremely comfortable. My only complaint is that there isn't much arch support. I threw in some thin arch supports and boom... the perfect hiking shoe. I also just went on an early morning hike recently and the grass was covered in morning dew... my feet stayed dry the entire time. My mom just bought them too and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these exact shoes. I love them. I completely wore my last pair out after several years of almost constant wear. They fit great and are very comfortable. I walk my dogs miles per day, and these never hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: KarenS50

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the shoe not the company I ordered them from
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. Arrived when expected. Just not a fan of these hiking shoes. I own other Keen sandals and love them so was excited to try these but they're not comfortable for walking. I've switched out the insoles to Dr. Scholl's gel insoles and that helps a little but I won't buy another pair of shoes like these.
customer_reviews.author: Loves NC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love Keens. This shoe makes it feel like you don't have shoes on. Very light.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: This shoe did not fit like other Keen shoes, and don’t know how to describe it’s Ill fit. Best day it’s just an awkward shoe.😏
customer_reviews.author: S S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Been buying Keen for a while now. Made well and great quailty. Kids love them for hiking very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive! Get lots of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Easy comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easy comfortable shoes. Have hiked Virginia trails and Alaska trails and never thought about my feet. That is the sign of a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Denni HB

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes but I've had them since May and the insides are already tearing up.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Run 1/2 size short. Discovered this after 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Run 1/2 size short. Discovered this after 2 weeks of wear and now cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: dancer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably, I relied on the manufacturer's suggestion to order this shoe in a half size smaller than what I normally wear. I love the style and look and hope the seller makes the decision to allow me to exchange for a larger size. I'm waiting up to 48 hours for the seller to determine whether they'll allow me to return/exchange the shoes......hopefully, this will be a positive experience and I'll receive the larger size and will be able to upgrade my rating for both the seller and shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new Keen Very light, nice color and robust in the same time!
customer_reviews.author: silvia secco

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I got these last year for a walking trip in England. Love them and wear them all the time. They fit my slightly wide feet perfectly, and I was able to wear them right out of the box without any breaking in. I got the red, and always get compliments on them. There's less arch support than other Keens, so I switched in more supportive arch supports but I'm not rating down for that because these are more like sneakers than hikers and I wouldn't necessarily expect a lot of arch support for a shoe like this.
customer_reviews.author: BeBo
